plot: An intimate portrait of three girls sold into Cambodia's huge sex industry. Together the girls face their brutal existence with courage and grace.
title: The Girls of Phnom Penh
plot_es: An intimate portrait of three girls sold into Cambodia's huge sex industry. Together the girls face their brutal existence with courage and grace.
plot_en: An intimate portrait of three girls sold into Cambodia's huge sex industry. Together the girls face their brutal existence with courage and grace.
